name: IndianNurseryRhymes
0:
”Alexa, play indian nursery rhymes”
”Alexa, start indian nursery rhymes”
”Alexa, begin indian nursery rhymes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian nursery rhymes
des:
Indian Nursery Rhymes provide you with the latest and old rhymes every day. If you want to listen to a rhyme or a poem just say "Alexa, play Indian nursery rhymes".
Once invoked, Alexa will automatically start the conversation and play the poem. The skills by saying "Alexa, open Indian nursery rhymes". After invoking Alexa automatically starts the rhyming poem. Once it is finished you can invoke again by saying "Alexa, open Indian nursery rhymes".
The Alexa skill is specially designed for kids of age group 4-13 years old.
We are continuously adding more and more handpicked skills which could bring more value education among them and entertain you.
Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one.
We want to hear from you!

For all users in India and the rest parts of the world, the skill responses in Hindi and English audio.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Disclaimer
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This “Indian Nursery rhymes ” Alexa skill is intended for fun and entertainment purposes only. It contains audio in Indian local language ‘Hindi’ and in 'English'. Users of this skill are fully aware of the local language and accepted to play the poem with their own knowledge and experience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
